Posts.Content: WonderWoman75 wrote: I have invasive carcinoma. I am seeing the surgeon today. Just got diagnosed four days ago. I'm really not sure how to feel. Dx 8/3/2018, IDC, Left, 2cm, Stage IA, Grade 1, ER+/PR+, HER2- (FISH) Surgery 8/27/2018 Lymph node removal: Sentinel; Mastectomy: Left; Prophylactic mastectomy: Right; Reconstruction (left): Tissue expander placement; Reconstruction (right): Tissue expander placement Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Just Diagnosed and Seeing Surgeon Today WonderWoman75 GrannyK
